criteria.name: briefing_text_present
criteria.description: Briefing text is present with 200-300 words, TTS-optimized (no markdown, no abbreviations)

criteria.name: sources_referenced
criteria.description: At least 2 different report types referenced in the briefing content

criteria.name: focus_recommendation
criteria.description: Contains a clear single-focus recommendation for the day

criteria.name: changes_since_yesterday
criteria.description: Mentions specific changes or developments since the previous day

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, markdown formatting, or [INSERT text
